summary: The Aerial Firefighting Enhancement Act of 2025 aims to amend the Wildfire Suppression Aircraft Transfer Act of 1996. It reauthorizes the Department of Defense to sell aircraft and parts for wildfire suppression, broadening the permitted use to include water and specifying that aircraft sold can only be used for wildfire suppression. The bill extends the authority period from October 1, 2025, to October 1, 2035.
